FOUND IN: Magpie (known for collecting shiny objects, thus 'thieving')
Froglet (juvenile stage before becoming fully mature)
Bap (UK English, similar in size but not necessarily 'large')
Nelson - Vice Admiral Horatio Nelson, the most famous British naval commander, commanded at the Battle of Trafalgar in 1805.

CLUE: Figure of a person made of ice crystals
